member.name: T:Api.Controllers.ConfigController
member.summary: Handles operations related to language configuration settings.

member.name: T:Api.Controllers.KeyController
member.summary: API Controller for managing Key operations.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.#ctor(DomainService.Services.IKeyManagementService,Blocks.Genesis.ChangeControllerContext,FluentValidation.IValidator{DomainService.Services.TranslateBlocksLanguageKeyRequest})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The service for managing keys.
The context for changing controller state.
The validator for TranslateBlocksLanguageKeyRequest.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.Save(DomainService.Services.Key)
member.summary: Saves a new or existing key to the system.
member.param: The key object to be saved.
member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the save operation.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.SaveKeys(System.Collections.Generic.List{DomainService.Services.Key})
member.summary: Saves multiple keys to the system in a single operation.
member.param: The list of key objects to be saved.
member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the bulk save operation.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.Gets(DomainService.Services.GetKeysRequest)
member.summary: Retrieves all available keys based on applied filters.
member.param: The query parameters containing filters for key retrieval.
member.returns: A containing the filtered list of keys.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.GetTimeline(DomainService.Services.GetKeyTimelineRequest)
member.summary: Retrieves Key timeline with pagination.
member.param: The query parameters for filtering and pagination.
member.returns: A paginated list of objects.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.Get(DomainService.Services.GetKeyRequest)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific key by item ID.
member.param: The request containing the item ID of the key to retrieve.
member.returns: A object if found; otherwise, null.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.Delete(DomainService.Services.DeleteKeyRequest)
member.summary: Deletes a specific key by item ID.
member.param: The request containing the item ID of the key to delete.
member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the delete operation.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.GetUilmFile(DomainService.Services.GetUilmFileRequest)
member.summary: Returns a JSON UILM file for a specified module and language.
member.param: The request containing the project key, module, and language information.
member.returns: A JSON UILM file as a string.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.GenerateUilmFile(DomainService.Services.GenerateUilmFilesRequest)
member.summary: Generates a UILM file for download. Must be called before calling /key/getuilmfile.
member.param: The request containing the parameters for UILM file generation.
member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the file generation request.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.TranslateAll(DomainService.Services.TranslateAllRequest)
member.summary: Translates all keys without values. If a module is specified, only keys from that module are translated.
member.param: The request containing the project key and optional module filter.
member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the translation request.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.TranslateKey(DomainService.Services.TranslateBlocksLanguageKeyRequest)
member.summary: Translates a specific BlocksLanguageKey by sending it to the translation queue.
member.param: The request containing key ID, project key, and translation parameters.
member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the translation request.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.UilmImport(DomainService.Services.UilmImportRequest)
member.summary: Imports a UILM file. Existing keys are updated. Existing modules are not replaced. New keys are added; removed keys are ignored.
member.param: The request containing the UILM file data and project key.
member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the import operation.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.UilmExport(DomainService.Services.UilmExportRequest)
member.summary: Exports all modules or selected ones with their keys.
member.param: The request containing the project key and optional module selection for export.
member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the export operation.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.DeleteCollections(DomainService.Services.DeleteCollectionsRequest)
member.summary: Deletes entire key collections. (Admin use only; to be removed from public API.)
member.param: The request containing the list of collections to delete.
member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the delete operation.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.GetUilmExportedFiles(DomainService.Services.GetUilmExportedFilesRequest)
member.summary: Gets a paginated list of exported UILM files.
member.param: The request containing pagination parameters.
member.returns: A paginated list of exported UILM files.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.KeyController.RollBack(DomainService.Services.RollbackRequest)
member.summary: Reverts keys to a previous state.
member.param: The request containing the item ID and rollback parameters.
member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the rollback operation.

member.summary: Saves a new or existing language.

member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the operation.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.LanguageController.Gets(DomainService.Services.GetLanguagesRequest)
member.summary: Retrieves all available languages.

member.name: M:Api.Controllers.LanguageController.Delete(DomainService.Services.DeleteLanguageRequest)
member.summary: Deletes a specific language.

member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the delete operation.

member.summary: Sets the default language.

member.returns: An indicating the success or failure of the operation.

member.summary: Saves a new module or updates an existing one.

member.returns: An indicating the result of the save operation.

member.summary: Retrieves a list of all available modules.

member.name: T:Api.ServiceRegistry
member.summary: A static class responsible for registering application services and validators.

member.summary: Registers services and validators related to modules, languages, and keys.
